constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 40 (Monday, March 7, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KIM of New Jersey:
H.R. 6957.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1330]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To expand opportunities for employment of recent graduates in Federal Government positions, and for other purposes.
